TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Csc extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler

summary.span: 实现 Csc 任务。

span.span: Implements the Csc task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 Csc 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the Csc element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [Csc 任务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8c19b36-f5ca-484b-afa6-8ff3b90e103a)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [Csc Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8c19b36-f5ca-484b-afa6-8ff3b90e103a).

summary.span: 获取或设置加载 DLL 的首选基址。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred base address at which to load a DLL.

value.span: 加载 DLL 的首选基址。

span.span: The preferred base address at which to load a DLL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DLL 的默认基址由 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 公共语言运行时设置。The default base address for a DLL is set by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] common language runtime. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [/baseaddress（C# 编译器选项）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/baseaddress (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md).

summary.span: 通过主机对象编译项目。

span.span: Compiles the project through the host object.

returns.span: 如果编译成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if compilation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主机对象传递给此方法将会调用在执行期间`Csc`任务。This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示 Csc 任务是否会对溢出数据类型边界的整数算法导致运行时异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the Csc task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.

value.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示如果是否为 true Csc任务是否会导致溢出的数据类型边界的整数算法的运行时异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether true if the Csc task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [/checked（C# 编译器选项）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/checked-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/checked (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/checked-compiler-option.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReport { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ErrorReport : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于将 C# 内部编译器错误报告给 Microsoft 的方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

value.span: 用于将 C# 内部编译器错误报告给 Microsoft 的方法。

span.span: The method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值可以`prompt`， `send`，或`none`。This property can have a value of `prompt`, `send`, or `none`. 如果该属性设置为`prompt`，发生内部编译器错误时，将收到的提示。If the property is set to `prompt`, you will receive a prompt when an internal compiler error occurs. 该提示让你将一个 Bug 报告以电子方式发送给 Microsoft。The prompt lets you send a bug report electronically to Microsoft. 如果该属性设置为`send`，会自动发送 bug 报告。If the property is set to `send`, a bug report is sent automatically. 如果该属性设置为`none`，仅在编译器的文本输出中报告错误。If the property is set to `none`, the error is reported only in the text output of the compiler. 默认值为 `none`。Default is `none`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [/errorreport（C# 编译器选项）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/errorreport-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/errorreport (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/errorreport-compiler-option.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GenerateFullPaths { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.GenerateFullPaths : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是在编译器输出中生成文件的绝对路径 () 还是在编译器输出中生成文件的名称 ()。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output () or to generate the name of the file in the compiler output ().

value.span: 如果Csc任务应在编译器输出; 生成的文件的绝对路径如果Csc任务应在编译器输出中生成的文件的名称。

span.span: if the Csc task should generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output; if the Csc task should generate the name of the file in the compiler output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [/fullpaths（C# 编译器选项）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/fullpaths-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/fullpaths (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/fullpaths-compiler-option.md).

Protected Overrides Function GenerateFullPathToTool () As String

span.span: Returns the full file path of the Csc tool.

returns.span: Csc 工具的完整文件路径。

span.span: The full file path of the Csc tool.

summary.span: 返回用于指示下一步操作的宿主对象初始化状态值。

span.span: Returns a host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

returns.span: 用于指示下一步操作的宿主对象初始化状态值。

span.span: A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主机对象传递给此方法将会调用此任务执行期间`Csc`任务。This method will get called during execution of this task if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示 Csc 任务是否应阻止导入 mscorlib.dll，后者定义整个系统命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the Csc task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll, which defines the entire System namespace.

value.span: 如果Csc任务应该阻止导入 mscorlib.dll; 否则为。

span.span: if the Csc task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要定义或创建自己的 System 命名空间和对象，请使用此属性。Use this property if you want to define or create your own System namespace and objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [/nostdlib（C# 编译器选项）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nostdlib-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/nostdlib (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nostdlib-compiler-option.md).

member this.Platform : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置输出文件的目标处理器平台。

span.span: Gets or sets the processor platform to be targeted by the output file.

value.span: 将作为输出文件目标的处理器平台。

span.span: The processor platform to be targeted by the output file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值可以**x86**， **x64**，或**anycpu**。This property can have a value of **x86**, **x64**, or **anycpu**. 默认值是**anycpu**。Default is **anycpu**. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [/platform（C# 编译器选项）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/platform-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/platform (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/platform-compiler-option.md).

Returns the name of the language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为 null，"/ preferreduilang"省略，则编译器将使用其默认设置。If set to null, "/preferreduilang" is omitted and the compiler uses its default setting.
